name: Monster Smash (JacobBonner)
description: You, the mad doctor Papyrusshmirtz, are developing a monster ready to take over the world. However, competing scientists are sending in their own creatures to stop you from achieving that before them. Little do they know they’re supplying you with all the materials you need as they burst into your lab! Grow appendages for you monster so it can harvest the invaders and protect it's heart!
